sciknow-25x1-research-problems.problemStatement: The need for proactive vendor risk assessment (VRA) cycles in third-party risk management (TPRM) to uncover and mitigate notable threats.
sciknow-25x1-research-problems.businessRelevance: The relevance of effective VRAs to business needs is in identifying and mitigating security risks across various domains, which is crucial for maintaining business resiliency and protecting against cybersecurity threats.

sciknow-25x1-research-questions.questionText: How can proactive vendor risk assessment cycles uncover and mitigate all notable threats in third-party risk management?
To what extent does the Shared Assessments Standardized Information Gathering questionnaire aid in identifying security risks across various domains?

relatedVariables.variableName: Shared Assessments Standardized Information Gathering questionnaire

sciknow-25x1-methodological-frameworks.name: Vendor Risk Assessment Methodology
sciknow-25x1-methodological-frameworks.description: The methodology involves using the Shared Assessments Standardized Information Gathering (SIG) questionnaire to conduct vendor risk assessments. The SIG questionnaire is a tool designed to uncover and mitigate security risks across various domains such as cybersecurity, IT operations, privacy, data governance, and business resiliency. It comes in two versions: SIG Core and SIG Lite, which are customizable to address specific risk domains and controls.

studyDesign.designDetails: The study design is based on a survey approach using a standardized questionnaire to assess vendor risks. The SIG questionnaire is used as the primary instrument for data collection, and it is not specified whether there is a control group or randomization involved.

steps.description: Select the appropriate version of the SIG questionnaire (Core or Lite) based on the scope and depth of the risk assessment required.
Customize the SIG questionnaire by selecting questions relevant to the specific risk domains, mapping references, and control categories of interest.
Administer the customized SIG questionnaire to the vendors being assessed to gather information on their security controls and risk exposure.
Analyze the responses to identify notable threats and areas requiring mitigation.

procedures.procedureDescription: The procedure involves administering the SIG questionnaire to assess the risks associated with third-party vendors. The questionnaire is designed to identify security risks in various domains and is customizable to fit the specific needs of the assessment.
